00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __I2CM_H
00030 #define __I2CM_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 
00037 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00038 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00039 
00040 #define I2CM_SPEED    (400000)
00041 #define I2CM          HTCFG_I2CM_ID
00042 
00043 #define I2CM_DelayXuS DelayXuS
00044 
00045 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00046 typedef struct
00047 {
00048   u8 DevAddr;
00049   u8 RegAddrMode;
00050   u8 Direction;
00051   vu8 Status;
00052   u16 RegAddr;
00053   u16 Length;
00054   u16 Counter;
00055   u16 RetryDownCounter;
00056   void (*TransferEndCallback)(void);
00057   u8* Buffer;
00058   u8 IsConfigured;
00059   bool IsRegAddrSent;
00060 } I2CM_TransferType;
00061 
00062 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 #define I2CM_OK                     0
00064 #define I2CM_BUSY                   1
00065 #define I2CM_SLAVE_NO_RESPONSE      2
00066 #define I2CM_BUFFER_NULL            3
00067 #define I2CM_ARBLOS                 4   /*!< I2C transfer status : Error caused by Arbitration Loss         */
00068 #define I2CM_BUSERR                 5   /*!< I2C transfer status : Error caused by bus error                */
00069 #define I2CM_TOUTF                  6
00070 
00071 #define I2CM_WORD_ADDR_MODE_1BYTE   0
00072 #define I2CM_WORD_ADDR_MODE_2BYTE   1
00073 
00074 #define I2CM_OWN_ADDR       (0x00)
00075 #define I2CM_BUS_MAX_RETRY  (0xFF)
00076 
00077 #define I2CM_DIRECTION_OUT   0
00078 #define I2CM_DIRECTION_IN    1
00079 
00080 #define I2CM_DBGEN  (0)
00081 
00082 #if (I2CM_DBGEN != 0)
00083   #define I2CM_DBG_PRINTF printf
00084 #else
00085   #define I2CM_DBG_PRINTF(...)
00086 #endif
00087 
00088 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00089 void I2CM_Init(void);
00090 void I2CM_WordAddressModeConfig(u32 word_addr_mode);
00091 void I2CM_InstallTransferEndCallback(void (*callback)(void));
00092 void I2CM_UninstallTransferEndCallback(void);
00093 void I2CM_BufferRead(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count);
00094 void I2CM_BufferWrite(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count);
00095 u32 I2CM_GetTransferStatus(void);
00096 ErrStatus I2CM_WaitTransferEnd(void);
00097 ErrStatus I2CM_BlockedBufferRead(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count);
00098 ErrStatus I2CM_BlockedBufferWrite(u16 dev, u16 word_addr, u8* data, u16 count);
00099 
00100 #ifdef __cplusplus
